resources.string:
While logged in, your API key can be found at %s/settings in the "API" section. It will look like a string of nonsense.

Paste your api key into the "API Key" field in settings to allow the app to talk to Kutt servers on your behalf. It's a lot like logging into Kutt.

DO NOT share this key with sources/people you don't trust!
Enable anonymous crash metrics? This helps the Shears app developer fix crashes and errors faster. You can enable/disable in Settings as well.
Shears currently only supports logged-in users.\nPlease go to settings and add your API key.
TODO: link updating is coming soon!
